get.description:
接受app发送来的command log, 格式如下
{
    "user": "admin",
    "asset": "localhost",
    "system_user": "web",
    "session": "xxxxxx",
    "input": "whoami",
    "output": "d2hvbWFp",  # base64.b64encode(s)
    "timestamp": 1485238673.0
}

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

priority.description: 优先级可选范围为1-100，1最低优先级，100最高优先级
